column4: Can someone help me with COMPIZ-FUSION?  The CCSM is not showing up under Preferences>Appearance.  Any idea why?
Can someone help me with COMPIZ-FUSION?  The CCSM is not showing up under Preferences>Appearance.  Any idea why?
i think so, Synaptic says it is installed
if you hit Alt-F2 and then type in 'ccsm' (without quotes) and hit enter, what happens?

could you double check that you have the compizconfig-settings-manager installed? just type ' sudo apt-get install compizconfig-settings-manager' without quotes in terminal and that will tell you if it is not installed
it just did alot of unpacking
well, i'd say it cant have been installed then, so its installing it now :)
once that's all finished it should be in System --> Preferences --> Appearance or in System --> Preferences --> Advanced Desktop Effects Settigns
and there it is!! woohoo!  you da man!
no probs :) have fun and have a play with those settings :D
